name: Infinite-Speed-Racing
description:
Infinite Speed Racing game you will be playing as gun car driving in his car and chasing the Enemies on the city highway.  Enemies car is running in the city roads you are chasing them and you have to shoot them with the help of guns designed in your car. Chase, shoot and destroy them in order to be a good car eliminate crimes in your city.

There’s a lot of good cars in this Infinite Speed Racing game. Choose your own favourite police car including Lamborghini and luxury beasts.  Accomplish the task given to you in every mission and proceed to your next more challenging level of chase and shoot the enemies. Upon completing of task or mission you will rewarded with free coins and you can unlock your favourite beast from the car selection menu. Cars are fully loaded with machine guns to shoot, kill and destroy the enemies in no time.
Use your driving skills to drive and shoot at the same time. Different missions require different tasks. During some mission accomplishment you have to shoot multi cars of thieves. So be careful about your shoot and drive skills.

Features of Infinite Speed Racing game 
* HD Graphics 
* City highway environment 
* 20 challenging chase up levels
* Smooth gameplay
* Friendly controls 
* Machine guns loaded Cars
* Drive and shoot
